messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Re: in defense of rednecks
messages.msgSnippet: There are almost always weaving, of several types, entries in the county fairs as well as the quilts, canning etc. Sharon of the Swamp ...
messages.messageBody:
There are almost always weaving, of several types,
entries in the county fairs as well as the quilts,
canning etc.

Sharon of the Swamp

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/30/02 10:26:35 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< > There's anyone weaving in the SE?
>
Yes. It's geting bigger and bigger. >>

But it's not a 19th century cottage tradition a la Foxfire stuff, right?

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: in defense of rednecks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/30/2002 9:28:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Yes. It s geting bigger and bigger. Woven cloth is SO lovely. I m hoping to go to a weaving
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/30/2002 9:28:02 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
> WOVEN?
> There's anyone weaving in the SE?
>
Yes. It's geting bigger and bigger. Woven cloth is SO lovely. I'm hoping to
go to a weaving class in the Spring at John C Campbell Folk School in NC.
Gotta weave that alpaca!

Kelly
